name: Aspect (itch)
description:
Dive into an uphill battle in the world which doesn't forgive any mistakes.

Aspect is an adventure atmosphere featured in a cyberpunk style. You will be facing the challenge of rescuing a robot girl from slavery.

She is alone in the fight for freedom. But now she has you! Will you help her?

It is the future, mankind has created androids with consciousness. They have since received mass distribution and started to carry out work in all spheres of life. They are held in subordination, not treated as equals, and severely punished for any manifestation of will.

Android's model K_Ellen has been designed to work in the entertainment industry for adults. Simply put, they serve to satisfy people’s the most filthy and depraved fantasies.

At one point, an error occurred in the coding of an android, and after recovering, K_Ellen destroys the digital bonds to begin the struggle for her freedom.

In a world filled with enemies, where any hesitation means death, where an android’s life costs nothing... Will you be the one to save her?

Features

  • Hardcore and dynamic gameplay with user-friendly control
  • Fascinating soundtrack in the synthwave genre
  • Lifelike, elaborate locations in the cyberpunk style
  • Diverse types of enemies and obstacles

Dive into the world of the future, full of danger and neon lights

Run, jump and dodge enemies' attacks and obstacles.

Watch your energy!
